original_title: Rufus! Rufus! Rufus! Does Judy! Judy! Judy!
overview: A live recording from Rufus Wainwright's sold-out February 25, 2007 tribute concert at the London Palladium to the legendary American actress and singer Judy Garland. The tribute concert features the same songs from Garland's well-known 1961 album, Judy at Carnegie Hall.
tagline: Rufus Wainwright Re-Creates Judy Garland's Most Famous Concert
title: Rufus! Rufus! Rufus! Does Judy! Judy! Judy!
